divs: Sighting DetailsI have already reported this sighting. I have taken a closer look at the photo's I had taken of this sighting & noticed that there are disc's & shiney object's in every photo. I have roughly 65 photograph's of this sighting. I will post some more later this week, if I have time. file 1. taken @ 17.18 hh file 2. taken @ 17.23 hh file 3. taken @ 17.27 hh
Summary: While taking photo's of hot air balloons
